main event: A military observer reported a sighting of a bright light that seemed to climb and disappear into the cloud cover at Fort Benning, Georgia on 1 July 1968.
interesting points: The light was observed at approximately 35 degrees elevation from the observer's location., The observer noted that the light appeared to rise in its trajectory., No photographs were available in the report., The observer used no optical aids and sighted the object with the naked eye., The observer was a military personnel stationed at Fort Benning.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: Randolph Reese, a Major in the military, stationed at Headquarters, 6th CC Bn, Ft Benning, GA.
